award_title: RAPID: Downstream water quality impacts of post-wildfire debris flows
subject: Training the next generation of fire hydrology researchers
body:
Hi Anna,

Post-wildfire water quality is becoming more urgent every year, and I'm guessing your team is building analysis tools and datasets that could be useful beyond just your watershed.

The problem is that computational work usually dies in supplementary files. Ouro helps researchers publish tools and data in a way that's actually reusable. When other labs use your team's work, your students' names travel with itâ€”durable credit that follows them through their careers.

Worth a quick chat? I'll keep it short.

Hope you had a good holiday.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
